body.header: What will I learn in this unit?

ol.li: listen to people explaining a variety of Internet-related terms and match each explanation to the appropriate word or phrase.
complete notes about the Universe and then listen to an introductory lecture on astronomy and check your answers.
complete the notes a student made during the astronomy lecture with appropriate words and phrases.
listen to some students talking about the science courses they are doing and match each description to the appropriate subject.
complete sentences with an appropriate adjective or noun.
